Welcome to Kenya Ordnance Factories Corporation

Kenya Ordnance Factories Corporation (KOFC) is a State Corporation under the Ministry of Defence mandated to manufacture Hardware, Machinery and Equipment. The Corporation which is ISO 9001:2008 certified manufactures small arms ammunition and fabricates high precision tools and parts using the latest technology. KOFC is located along Eldoret – Kitale road 20 Km from Eldoret town.

Our Quality Policy

Our policy is geared towards providing quality products to meet customers’ needs. In this regard, we are fully committed to identifying and continually improving our production processes and training of staff to ensure satisfaction of our customers.

Our Corporate Values

KOFC’s corporate values are:

  • QUALITY: Our services/products are continuously checked for quality to meet customers’ requirements.
  • SECURITY: Due to the nature of products the identity of the end user and nature of use is of utmost importance to us.
  • SAFETY: this applies both in our factory and at the point of use.
  • KNOWLEDGE:Kofc will pursue knowledge for its staff and Endeavour to integrate new technology in its operations and management process.
  • CARE AND PROTECTION OF ENVIRONMENT. This applies to our production operation and disposal of waste.

    • About

    Who we are

    KOFC is a state corporation established under legal notice No. 125 of 23rd July 1997. KOFC is Kenya’s only ammunition production firm. It has two (2) divisions:

    • Ammunition Production Division
    • General Engineering Division

    • Mission & Vision

    • Our Policy

    • Our Goals

    • ISO

    KOFC is an ISO 9001:2008 certified company.

    This demonstrates the ability of the corporation on establishing and documenting effective integrated systems that meet the customer needs while at the same time comply with the national law and various internationally recognized NATO standards and specifications. The ISO certification guarantees consistency, reliability and excellent customer responsiveness. All materials inputs are subjected to inspections and acceptance procedure to asure quality production for our customers who are priority at KOFC

      Our quality objectives include:

    • Ensure proper installation of factory machinery, inspections and calibrations modifications of all equipment and products..
    • Developing and implementing of quality standards and auditing procedures

    Our Mission

    To enhance national security through guaranteed production of quality small arms ammunition and related auxiliary products for the nation.

    Our Vision

    To be a leading manufacturer of small arms ammunition and related products in the region.

    KOFC Quality Policy

    KOFC is committed to producing high-quality small arms ammunition that meets national and international standards. We ensure excellence, safety, and compliance, delivering reliable products to our customers on time. Through innovation, continuous improvement, and ethical operations, we uphold the highest industry standards while prioritizing environmental responsibility and workplace safety. Our goal is to maintain customer satisfaction by providing top-tier products and services with integrity and professionalism.

    Our Goals

    At Kenya Ordnance Factories Corporation (KOFC), we are committed to excellence in manufacturing, innovation, and national security. Our goals focus on delivering high-quality products while upholding integrity, efficiency, and sustainability.

    • Strengthening National Security: We aim to support Kenya’s defense sector by manufacturing reliable, high-quality ordnance products that enhance the security and preparedness of our armed forces.
    • Ensuring Quality and Compliance: We adhere to international standards and strict quality controls to provide products that meet the highest levels of safety, performance, and reliability.
    • Supporting Economic Growth & Job Creation: We contribute to Kenya’s industrial growth by fostering local manufacturing, creating employment opportunities, and enhancing skills development in the defense sector.

    About

    Behind the Brand

    Our Objectives

    • To competitively manufacture quality small arms ammunition.
    • To diversify product range to meet customer needs.
    • To produce and sell small arms ammunition to authorized markets.
    • To fulfill customer requirements timely.

    Our Customers

    • Kenya Armed Forces, All Kenyan security agencies
    • Licensed arms dealers in the country, Approved friendly governments
    • International bodies, Strategic partners
    • Industrialists, Farmers, Millers & The public

    Services

    What we do offer

    Small Arms Ammunition Manufacturing

    KOFC produces high-quality small arms ammunition adhering to NATO military standards

    Precision Engineering Services

    KOFC's General Engineering Division specializes in fabricating high-precision tools and parts using advanced technology.

    Agricultural Products

    KOFC engages in agricultural production, offering farm produce such as cereals. This diversification supports food security and contributes to the local economy.

    KDF Water (Thika Satellite Branch)

    Our Thika branch offers high-quality, purified KDF-branded water, ensuring safe and clean drinking water for households and businesses.

    Bakery

    Our bakery specializes in producing high-quality, freshly baked bread to meet the daily needs of our customers. We use the finest ingredients and modern baking techniques to ensure our bread is soft, nutritious, and delicious. With a commitment to consistency and hygiene, we supply bread that is perfect for households, businesses, and retail outlets.

    Milling and Animal Feeds

    KOFC provide high-quality milling services, processing grains such as maize and wheat into fine flour for household and commercial use. Our milling process ensures consistency, nutritional value, and freshness. Additionally, we produce nutrient-rich animal feeds designed to support livestock health and growth.

    Frequently Asked Questions

    Frequently Asked Questions

    KOFC is a state corporation under the Ministry of Defence, established in 1997, with the mandate to manufacture hardware, machinery, and equipment. It specializes in producing small arms ammunition and fabricating high-precision tools and parts using advanced technology.

    The corporation is situated along the Eldoret–Kitale Road, approximately 20 kilometers from Eldoret town in Kenya.

    Feedback

    For complaints, suggestions, or compliments, contact the Managing Director via post, telephone, fax, or email.

    Report Corruption

    Toll-Free Numbers: 020 2000718 / 020 2000719 / 020 2000720

    Complaint Handling Process:

    • Customer care office operations
    • Maintaining complaint registers & suggestion boxes
    • Ensuring confidentiality & privacy
    • Prompt response to complaints

    Note: Complainants should identify themselves to facilitate resolution.

    KOFC periodically reviews its charter to enhance service delivery.
